summary: These standalone mods changes the appearance of Astrid, Karliah and Aela. These mod's purpose is to enhance the appearance of lore based characters. Reccomended for lore loving players.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/2nu0uj4.jpg[/img]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6][center]REBORN SERIES
[size=3]Welcome to Reborn Series Mod. These mods replaces the [url=#]appearance[/url] of in game characters into a more attractive and lore based appearance. They are standalone mods so they will not require other mods. At the moment I am focusing on quest based characters which has a limited amount of mods that improve their appearance, though I accept requests for specific characters and improvements of my own mods. I recommend feedback since these mods are in it's Alpha stage and please report any mod conflicts or bugs.
[size=6]
UPDATES[/size]
I am currently working on the [url=#]guild members[/url] of the different factions.
Next Release with be The Dark Brotherhood initiates.

[size=6][url=#]REQUIREMENTS[/url][/size]
1. SKYRIM version 1.9.32.0 or higher.[/size]
[size=3]2.[/size] [size=3]Nexus [url=#]Mod Manager[/url]. (If using NMM)
3. SKSE (If using NMM)[/size]
[size=3]
[size=6]CONFLICTS
[size=3]No mod conflicts have yet been detected.[/size]
[/size]Â  [url=#]TROUBLESHOOTING[/url][/size][size=2]
1. Check your loadorder.
2. Use BOSS for dirty edits or conflicts.
3. [url=#]Reinstall[/url] mod and overwrite files.
4. Check your mods that is related to the character.[/size]
[size=2]5. Report to me any mod conflicts or bugs.[/size]

REQUESTS
[size=3]If you have any requests of specific characters[/size] [size=3]or need to report any conflicts and bugs leave a comment in the comment section or message me privately.

[size=6][url=#]RECOMMENDED[/url] MODS[/size][/size] WITH MINE
